briefTitle: Ultrasound Paravertebral Block in Breast Surgery.
officialTitle: Single Injection, Ultrasound Guided Paravertebral Block for Anesthesia in Breast Surgery.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* American Society of Anesthesiologists classification I-III
* Written informed consent
* Age older than 18 years old

Exclusion Criteria:

* allergy to local anesthetics
* local sepsis
